img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong." It is likely a collectible or upgrade material, similar to the "Luojia Fragrant Vine" and "Awaken Wine Worm" mentioned in the preceding text. These items are categorized as "Legendary" and are used for upgrading rare gourds, with specific locations for acquisition (e.g., trees or vases in various chapters). The image's purpose is to visually represent one such upgrade material.
